H0.text: Which famous children's novel begins with the words "The mole had been working very hard all morning, spring cleaning his little home"". The Wind in the Willows

H1.text: Which famous children's novel begins with the words "The mole had been working very hard all morning, spring cleaning his little home"". The Tale of Despereaux

H2.text: Which famous children's novel begins with the words "The mole had been working very hard all morning, spring cleaning his little home"". The Secret Garden

H3.text: Which famous children's novel begins with the words "The mole had been working very hard all morning, spring cleaning his little home"". Wild Wood (novel)
